id.description: A unique id for the converted private key.

input_format.description:
The format of the provided private key.
  
  Supported formats: `PKCS#1`, `PKCS#8`.

output_format.description:
The format to convert the private key to.
  
  Supported formats: `PKCS#1`, `PKCS#8`.

output_pem.description: The converted private key, encoded as `PEM`.

block.description: Converts a RSA private key (e.g. from `PKCS#1` to `PKCS#8`).
